靁字的基本解释

靁
léi
古同“雷”。

靁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［léi］
［《廣韻》魯回切，平灰，來。］
亦作“靁1”。亦作“1”。
(1)云层放电时发出的响声。
(2)如雷般震响、传播。语出《孟子·万章下》“公侯皆方百里”汉赵岐注：“諸侯方百里，象雷震也。”
(3)宏大如雷的声音。
(4)大声的呵斥。
(5)军事上用的爆炸武器。
(6)通“罍”。古酒器名。
(7)汉代诸侯国名。见《史记·建元已来王子侯者年表》。
(8)姓。汉有雷被。见《汉书·淮南厉王刘长传》。
[②]［lèi］
［《集韻》盧對切，去隊，來。］
(1)通“擂”。
(2)通“礧”。古时作战用以击敌之石块。

靁字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【雨字部】　靁； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1380第11
【玉篇】與雷同。【詩·召南】殷其靁。【釋文】靁，亦作雷。【楚辭·九歌】靁塡塡兮雨冥冥。【前漢·中山靖王傳】聚蟁成靁。【註】師古曰：靁，古雷宇。言衆蚊飛聲有若雷也。　又【周禮·春官·大司樂】靁鼓靁鼗。　又地名。【史記·匈奴傳】北益廣田，至胘靁爲塞。【註】胘靁，地名，在烏孫北。　又【周禮·春官·龜人】掌六龜之屬，西龜曰靁屬。【釋文】力胃反，又如字。【爾雅·釋魚】龜左倪不類。【疏】倪，庳也，不發聲也，謂行時頭左邊向下者名類，周禮西龜曰靁屬是也。　又【集韻】力救切，音溜。龜名也。

靁
Basic explanation of words
靁
léi
Gu Tong "Thunder".
靁
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［léi］
["Guang Yun" Lu Hui cut, flat gray, come. ]
Also known as "靁 1". Also known as "1".
(1) The sound of cloud discharge.
(2) Shake and spread like thunder. In the words of "Mencius·Wanzhangxia", "The princes are all Fang Baili" Han Zhaoqi's note: "The princes Fang Baili are like Lei Zhen."
(3) The loud and thunderous voice.
(4) Shout loudly.
(5) Explosive weapons used in the military.
(6) Through "罍". Ancient wine vessel name.
(7) The names of the princes in the Han Dynasty. See "Historical Records: Chronology of the Princes Who Came to Jianyuan".
(8) Last name. Han has thunder quilt. See "The Book of Han · Huainan Li Wang Liu Chang's Biography".
[②]［lèi］
["Ji Yun" Lu cut, go to the team, come. ]
(1) Through "challenge".
(2) Through "礧". Stones used in ancient battles to hit the enemy.
靁

【戌集】【The Department of Rain Characters】　靁; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 1380 No. 11
【Jade articles】Same as the same. 【Poetry·Zhaonan】Yin Qichao. [Explanation] Qiu, also a thunder. [Songs of the Chu·Nine Songs] Kuaisuanyuan, raining and underworldly. [Previous Han·Zhongshan King Jing's Biography] [Note] Shi Gu said: Qiu, Gu Leiyu. It is said that the mosquitoes are flying.　[Zhou Li·Chun Guan·Da Si Le】King drums.　Also place name. [Historical Records · The Huns] Beiyi Guangtian, to Pangdan is a stop. 【Note】Pengqian, the place name, is in Wusunbei.　[Zhou Li·Chun Guan·Turtle Man] is the genus of palm six turtles, and the western turtle is called the genus Qi. 【Explanation】Strengthening the stomach is like a word. 【Erya·Shiyu】Guizuo Ni is not a class. [Shu] Ni, Yu Ye, do not make a sound, it is said that the name of the person whose head is down when the left side is down, Zhou Li Xigui said that the genus Qi is also.　[Jiyun] tried to save the cut, the sound slipped. The name of the tortoise is also.
